Peace Guga is the queen of fun, the best person to help you enjoy your summer holiday. She keeps the HomeChoice Marketing Department running smoothly as a Traffic Administrator. In her off-time she enjoys pampering herself, doing a little online shopping or relaxing with a good movie.
Everyone deserves to kick back, relax and have a little fun this summer, even if you’re stuck at home. That’s why I’ve put together a checklist of everything you need to give your family the best summer ever without breaking the bank or even leaving the house! It’s all available for you to order at homechoice.co.za
Every day can be a pool party
if you’re young or just young at heart
  • Chill in your inflatable pool
  • Enjoy floating entertainment like the Bestway volleyball set
  • Add to the poolside vibes with bright and beautiful beach towels
  • Don’t forget, it isn’t a pool party without music from your waterproof Bluetooth speaker
No pool, no problem
with other ways to have fun in the sun
  • Practice your soccer, netball, basketball or boxing skills with sports sets …
  • … or just bounce around on a trampoline
  • Relax while your little one enjoys his/her baby gym
  • Take some time out on your comfy outdoor furniture

Make summer meals magical
with braais and picnics - just because
  • Braai your way with a portable gas/charcoal braai
  • Make delicious sides with your family-size deep fryer
  • Complete the perfect outdoor dining experience with one of our picnic sets
  • BUT FIRST make sure you’ve neatened up your view with the help of gardening and DIY tools (it will be worth it)

Ban boredom
when the sun goes down
  • Have fun as a family with board games …
  • … or crush your competition with TV games
  • Make movie nights perfect with your own home theatre
  • Just add popcorn fresh out of the microwave
  • Stretch out on a super comfy sleeper couch
  • Dance the night away with music and lights straight out of your party speaker
And lastly…
  • Capture all your happy summer memories on a new camera or smartphone
